Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

As Nightshift and Rat Trap move in, they can definitely hear the sounds of a
battle going on. The smell of ozone fills the air, obviously there has been
a lot of laser fire, but the smell of gun powder and explosives gives
testimony to the other kinds of ordinance that have been in use as well.

As the duo gets closer, it is easy to discern where it was coming from as
they approached. As they got closer they came across what appeared to be
Insecticons, or at least their clones, since there were duplicates of
several different ones. There were several that looked as if they turned
into a green and orange bee, another four or five that turned into a green
and yellow Rhinoceros beetle of some sort. A yellow and black locust could
be seen flapping only one set of wings, but was buzzing angrily at a tree it
was lodged inside of, even as several brown stag beetles were lying strewn
about. All of them in various sorts of extreme damage, none of them looked
to be functional or if they were, capable of being aware of Nightshift and
Rat Trap as they made their way through.

However also mixed among the frames of the insecticons are the remains of
the insect like creatures that the Maximals had encountered underground, and
like before they were of different sizes and configurations, but were easily
recognizable. And much like the Insecticons, they lay in various degrees of
lifelessness.

The only action lay ahead, as through the trees the duo continued to hear
the sounds of battle and could see the bright flashing lights of laser fire.
What ever was going on it was just ahead!

(TAG)

Preston

--0016363b91a8fd8c6504a29e0a91
